channel.title: Please help!

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

why is there a ‘}’ at the top, and why do you need this line: ‘if ((itemID >= 995 && itemAmount >= 1000000)) {’?
And if it costs 5,000gp, why does it say } else { … “You need 23,000 GP to purchase 100 Barrage casts.”);
just curious. why does it say barrage, isn’t it vengeance?

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @rudeboijaz rudeboijaz
item.description:
@rudeboijaz wrote:

this command dont work, it takes the money, but if the money isnt there, it still spawns :/, please help under is my command, please help me fix or send me your command

}
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“vengy”)) {
p.getActionSender().addSoundEffect(p, 4039, 1, 0, 0);
if ((itemID >= 995 && itemAmount >= 1000000)) {
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 5000);//5k Coins
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 560, 2000);//Death
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 557, 10000);//Earth
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9075, 2000);//Astral
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p,“You purchase 100 barrage casts”);
} else {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p,“You need 23,000 GP to purchase 100 Barrage casts.”);
return;
}
